DataElement.preferredName: Disease Assessment Prior Infusion Procedure Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which information related to the examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction for any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person was made or an event collecting such information occurred, prior in time or order to a form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction for any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person._Earlier in time or order. (NCI)_Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease is any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Sometimes the term is used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Updated to add EVS concept preferred name. dw

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Any form of treatment that is introduced into the body via a blood vessel, a muscle, or the spinal cord.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: a spoken or written statement that is made in reply to a question or request.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
